pr_title: Add an API to retrieve position info from the public symbol API

timeline.message: Add a method to access the position from the public symbol API
Add test cases for symbol positions

timeline.bodyText: Went with position() for this since this is the term we are used to in the compiler. Should this be changed to something else? location() for example?
timeline.author: pubudu91
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -44,17 +45,25 @@
 
     /**
      * Get the Symbol Kind.
-     * 
+     *
      * @return {@link SymbolKind} of the symbol
      */
     SymbolKind kind();
 
     /**
      * Get the Documentation attachment bound to the symbol.
-     * 
+     *
      * @return {@link Optional} doc attachment
      */
     Optional<Documentation> docAttachment();
 
+    /**
+     * This retrieves position information of the symbol in the source code. The position given here is the location of
+     * the definition of the symbol.
+     *
+     * @return The position information of the symbol
+     */
+    Location position();

replies.bodyText: What if we change the model name Position? Either way I would +1 for Position position() or Location location()
replies.author: nadeeshaan

replies.bodyText:
+1 for location().
We use the same in the syntax tree as well.
replies.author: SupunS
